titleStmt.title: A complaynt of them that be to soone maryed
titleStmt.author: Copland, Robert, fl. 1508-1547.
Gringore, Pierre, ca. 1475-1538?, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Fynysshed and done the yere of our lorde a thousande. CCCCC. and. xxxv. at London enprynted also by Wynkyn de Worde in fletestrete at the sygne of the son,

notesStmt.note: Translated by Robert Copland, whose name appears in acrostic on B4r-v.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
